test-case.name: xdm-to-json-032
test-case.description: Map of arrays with indentation
test-case.test: let $out := xdm-to-json(map{"a":["x","y","z"],"b":[1,2,3]}, map{'indent':true()}) return map{'A':contains($out, ' '), 'B': $out => parse-json() => xdm-to-json()}

test-case.name: xdm-to-json-033
test-case.description: Array of arrays with indentation
test-case.test: let $out := xdm-to-json(["x","y","z",[1,2,3,[true(),false()]]], map{'indent':true()}) return map{'A':contains($out, ' '), 'B': $out => parse-json() => xdm-to-json()}

test-case.description: element node - request list format though element names are inconsistent. Fall back to mixed.
